titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Bibliophiles Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Mary Caldera

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:40

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of newsletters, membership information, and promotional materials documenting the activities of the Yale Bibliophiles.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 40 (YRG 40), Records of Yale clubs, societies, and organizations.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Arts of the Book, 2006.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Bibliophiles Records (RU 1003). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Yale Bibliophiles (ca. 1974-1990) were a group of individuals associated with Yale University who were interested in books and book arts. The group served the interests of its members by arranging trips, lectures, dicussions, and promoting the study of books and book arts.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of newsletters, membership information, and promotional materials documenting the activities of the Yale Bibliophiles.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by topic

did.unittitle: Administrative records, including newsletters, membership information, and promotional materials
